charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1101_0100_2:
Finding [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="himself" F="herself" ] incredibly lost on the road one day,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] decided to take a
gamble and enter a nearby cave.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1101_0200_2:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] hoped it would be a through path—a nice
shortcut to lead [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] back to where [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] wanted
to go...
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0401_0600_1: I thought so. You must be lost.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0402_0800_1:
It’s not very nice to lie, you know.
Either way, you don’t fool me.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_0900_1:
It isn’t difficult, by the way... I simply memorized
the sound of your footsteps—nothing more.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_1100_1: that last round shouldn’t count, Liepard.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0401_1300_1:
Didn’t know she was there, did you?
Though I wouldn’t really expect you to.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0402_1500_1:
Oh, just a game my Pokémon and I like to play.
We find the competition entertaining.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_1600_1:
I don’t know if you know this, but a Liepard can
conceal its presence, allowing it to stealthily sneak
up on its targets.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_1700_1:
So our little game consists of me closing my eyes
and attempting to guess Liepard’s location.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_1800_1:
Looks like Liepard is pretty keen on our little game
as well.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_1900_1:
Though originally, it was merely an exercise to
bolster my competitive instincts.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0401_2100_1:
You might say that, yes. We’ve been doing it for
a long, long time.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0402_2300_1:
As someone who lives and breathes competition
like I do, you know games are never just fun.
We take them seriously. We play to win.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_2400_1:
My past isn’t all sunshine and daisies, kid.
Back when I lived at the family estate,
I had to learn how to read people...
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_2500_1:
Adults can be tricky, see. I was in a situation
where I had to suss out who was being straight
with me and who was trying to use me.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_2600_1:
Eventually, I discovered how to do that.
It’s all about goals and intentions—
figuring out what people want the most.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_2700_1:
That’s what drives people to do what they do.
Figure that out, and you’ll see through any lie
or bluff... That, kid, is how you win a game.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_2800_1:
Judging by the question you asked me a moment
ago, I’m pretty sure I could guess what sort of
victory you crave the most.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0401_3000_1: You’re an honest kid. I can’t fault you for that.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0401_3100_1:
And you know what? Sometimes it’s the most
honest, purehearted of us that end up becoming
the strongest of all.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0302_3200_1:
Come on...
You couldn’t possibly know that.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0402_3300_1:
Don’t believe me? Well then, I guess you’ll just
have to wait until we battle to find out if I’m
telling the truth or not.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_0402_3400_1:
Don’t expect me to reveal my hand until we
do, though.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_3500_1: Heh heh... I think Liepard wants to test you now.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_3600_1:
Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ], close your
eyes... Tell me, where do you think Liepard is
right now?
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4100_1: Uh oh... Sounds like Liepard’s a little cranky.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4200_1:
She must be sulking. She probably thought she
could sneak up on you, but instead you found
her right away.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4300_1:
You’re a tenacious one, aren’t you, kid?
That might come in handy for you soon.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4400_1:
Finding your way through to the other side of this
mountain’s a bit of a gamble. There’s a fork in
the path up ahead that goes left or right.
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4500_1:
Heh heh... You’ve got the makings of a real
competitor in you, kid. And, well...no risk,
no gain, right?
charaepi_ch0048_00_gima/2301_1201_4600_1:
Indulge Uncle Grimsley in a game of chance...
Tell me. Which path will you choose?
